name: Friday Night Funkin' Roblox Demo
description:
This mod is based off of the animation "ROBLOX FRIDAY NIGHT FUNKIN'". The original gameplay shown in the video was not playable, so here is a remade, playable version!

(In order to play the custom song, you must play Pico on Normal mode)

Install Instructions:

1. Download a Copy of Friday Night Funkin'

2. Take the "FNF Noob Export Folder' and Unzip it

3. Move the "Assets" Folder into your Copy of Friday Night Funkin'

4. Enjoy!
